content:
ServerCommunicationLinkOperationsExtensions ServerCommunicationLinkOperationsExtensions Class

In this Article

Edit

The Windows Azure SQL Database management API provides a RESTful set of web services that interact with Windows Azure SQL Database services to manage your databases. The API enables users to create, retrieve, update, and delete databases and servers.

Syntax

Declaration

public static class ServerCommunicationLinkOperationsExtensions : objectPublic Module ServerCommunicationLinkOperationsExtensions
    Inherits Object
